word: der Test, die There is no plural form for the singular noun "article test."
definition: A methodical examination or evaluation conducted to assess knowledge, skills, abilities, or the quality, performance, or reliability of something or someone. It is commonly used in educational settings, professional assessments, or scientific experiments to measure understanding, proficiency, or the validity of hypotheses.

examples.english: I have to study for the test.

examples.german: Der Arzt hat einen Test gemacht.
